item.title: FPS: The New Generation, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3289
item.description: Description of this map: The sleeper has returned again, and this time they’re back with more tricks up their sleeves! The older drones were a failure in stopping you, so they have created a new generation of drones that shoot at you from a distance to try to stop you! Just make sure you don’t get hit by the bullets. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: VPAC Info Tutorial, by Vertu | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2786
item.description: Description of this map: I have tampered with the original PAC stuff to the point that I basically made another form of PAC. VPAC will feature more advanced and developed units than PAC and feature more developed enemy bases using custom units regularlly. I have provided an informative tutorial that can be used to help understand the more complex dynamics. Just know, it’s going to be a lot of information.

item.title: Up KnuCracker Car#2344 [Competition] | Creeper World 4 MarkV
item.description: This was a competition map on the KnuckleCracker Discord server (join if you didn’t yet! https://discord.gg/KnuckleCracker). The goal was to complete the totem objective as fast as possible, so we did! First I looked at the map playing itself for a minute to get a feel for the flow of creeper, after which we tackled this puppy! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.description: Description of this map: You decided to follow the path that Thrall has set out. Right away, you’re greeted with a world that has been force-claimed by the creeper. item.description: Description of this map: The AutoBuild script is originally made by WithersChat, then Auri added some things to it and I added their names to their scripts in comments. The Cursor script is made by myself. I know there’s a version where it shows it’s power but I don’t think that that would be very helpful. This map is a combination of both. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: FPS: Hangar, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1434
item.description: Description of this map: This is basically a recreation of the first level of Doom in CW4. It’s not a perfect recreation, since some features, like doors, are missing, but it’s quite close. The nukage won’t damage you if you step in them, so don’t worry about touching them, though there’s creeper breeder under them. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: The Laser, by Narcosis | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1680
item.description: Description of this map: An improved version of the laser scrip I used in my previeous map. The laser turret can be damaged with snipers. Select it to see range. Added in Input Variables. Reduced warning time to 8 seconds. fires every minute now. deposites creeper where it fires. produces 50 creeper every .5 seconds. Remember, the laser fires at the closest unit. script by me feel free to use it

item.title: Split Brain, by Heisenberg (Totems Only) [Competition] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #344
item.description: Description of this map: This oddly shaped structure seems to have two viable options for survival. Hard to tell which is the better option, you may just attempt to get a foothold on both early on, or this may just prove to be fatal. The creeper will be coming at you from all sides, so carefully review your options I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: [PAC] [CURSOR] The Vacuum, by CS Z | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1704
item.description: Description of this map: Play as a Central Hive-deployed drone from orbit with a creeper teleporting cursor. In the vacuum of space, no one can hear the rift lab scream…if they don’t know what hit them. A Lightweight PAC (LPAC) custom cursor map with a brand new type of cursor. Enjoy! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.description: Description of this map: This world is pretty dark to the point where your visibility is limited (but you can turn that off), and of course creeper is everywhere, as well as some glowing plant life? Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Numb- Queens Return v1.0, by number guy [PAC] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1912
item.description: Description of this map: The Creeper Queen arrives in orbit to find this world suppressed by the enemy and units weakened by the evil nullifiers. Reclaim this world in the name of the Creeper Queen. This is a Lightweight Play As Creeper (LPAC) map designed to be approachable by all players. Unique custom weapons/tools are available. See the intro A.D.A. message to learn how to play. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Stockpile Survival, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1207
item.description: Description of this map: How long can you survive against worsening conditions? An aggressive playstyle is rewarded, since you can effectively store infinite factory goods or energy, so it’s about gaining as much as you can, and then spending it efficiently. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube?

item.title: [PAC] Payback Round 3.1.0, by GuardianDragonlord | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1899
item.description: Description of this map: upgrade the technology and replace existing tools for a much more entertaining time taking what land you can and holding it High ground is nice but if you can’t hold it there’s no point trying to grab it give credit go to Alophox SGML, kaidenalex for the death ray the ball tesla blaster, IIRC new thor, uberwaffe more creepers, vertu AC makeer,V-Storage,V-Reactor, WithersChat, UberWaffe, Auri I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Numb- Queens Return v1.1, by numberguy (Cheese) [PAC] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2026
item.description: Description of this map: The Creeper Queen arrives in orbit to find this world suppressed by the enemy and units weakened by the evil nullifiers. Reclaim this world in the name of the Creeper Queen. This is a Lightweight Play As Creeper (LPAC) map designed to be approachable by all players. Unique custom weapons/tools are available. See the intro A.D.A. message to learn how to play. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Creeper Transmitter, by TrickyCorp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2412
item.description: Description of this map: It transmits creeper to other worlds. Good thing, you don’t have to deal with it. Bad thing, someone else might not survive because of the extra creeper… It counts how much you have failed to stop. Isn’t that nice? I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube?

item.title: 5 Islands of Unity, by Danu | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2293
item.description: Description of this map: This planet has been specifically carved into 5 islands floating in space held together by weird gravity. Island of Life with trees, fit for the power user, Island of Anti-Creeper with well Anti-Creeper and Bluite, Island of Guns with Redon and some ancient and modern tech on it, and Island of Rifts with Greenar. The Island of Darkness is yours and your friends’ target. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: A Different Story 2, by TrickyCorp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #643
item.description: Description of this map: After barely being able to escape your home world by teleporting the rift lab, you attempt to hide from the creeper. That is, until you find a useful tech. It’s scattered in several pieces though, but once all pieces are collected you are free to leave. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: The Queen Returns, by CS Z [PAC] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1205
item.description: Description of this map: The Queen of Creeper arrives in orbit to find this world suppressed by the enemy and units weakened by the evil nullifiers. Reclaim this world in the name of the Creeper Queen. This is a Lightweight Play As Creeper (LPAC) map designed to be approachable by all players. Three unique custom weapons/tools are available. See the intro A.D.A. message to learn how to play. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: FPS: Sleeper Dungeon, by Kaiden (Multiplayer) | Creeper World 4 MVerse #1573
item.description: Description of this map: A FPS map that takes place in a dungeon full of sleeper units. There are 3 new sleeper units in this map, and there are 6 zones. Many issues from the early version of this map has been fixed for the most part, so this means there won’t be excessive creeper in rooms that aren’t meant to have a lot of creeper, and sleeper weapons are easier to kill.

item.description: Description of this map: This map uses autobuild by WithersChat and Trickycorp’s Cursor. Let me know what you think of the gameplay! As the golden sands of this world brighten your view, you sense that the fight is beginning elsewhere in this human controlled system. As the ground grows near, you identify the shapes of powerful allies who arrived before you. It is clear that without them, the fight is already lost.

item.title: FPS: Blown Away, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1662
item.description: Description of this map: An Sleeper FPS map with autopilot. There are 2 new enemies in this map, and one of them is pretty explosive, and the other is pretty speedy but weak. I’ve also made it so that the moving enemies don’t all spawn at once at the very beginning of the game. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: PAC Assault, by Auri | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1493
item.description: Description of this map: A relatively straightforward PAC level, using WitherChat’s PAC mod, with a couple of new units mixed in. If you’re unfamiliar with that mod, you should probably play one of the other maps first. This shouldn’t be too hard, but it also doesn’t try to teach you the base mechanics. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Level 16, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1471
item.description: Description of this map: In this map you obtain the microrift, and you have to get from one side to the other side. Watch out though, there’s a stun tower that will stun a random unit every 2 second after 5 minutes. There’s also forbs. You also get to use laser towers, though there’s only 3 of them available in this map. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.description: The creator of this map has map some great stuff for CW4! Watch this if you want to see Kaiden’s tesla coil: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W-__G4nvFBk Description of this map: You escape the world that was shattered and disintegrating and make it to another world. Here you’ll get the shield, and also there’s a new unit here, which is the killable emitter. You can destroy the killable emitter by supplying packets to the emitter, which will damage the emitter and eventually kill it.

item.title: Contaiment Failure, by Bigbadblond (With Music) | Creeper World 4 Colonies #429
item.description: I accidentally did not record the sound, so I added some music of the game instead :) Description of this map: A fun map with some increasing difficulty! Containment will only last so long! This map is really hard - looks easy at the start! Use everything you can! Build as many turrets as possible! The totems might not be enough to save you when the stashes go critical! Use the totem islands to advance to the corner

item.title: Autopilot PAC, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #1055
item.description: Description of this map: A play as creeper level using a more advanced AI instead of the PAC rebuild. It is much more difficult than a normal PAC level, so if you’re new to the gamemode, this is not the place to start. Uses ERN power, not the manual ERNs from map 1051. Some numbers and mechanics have been changed for balance reasons. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: FPS: Whole Wide World, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #872
item.description: Description of this map: Trying out a more open level design. No locked weapons, no locked doors. Well, one locked door. Collect any 12 info caches to open it. The level scales as you progress, so don’t worry about an “intended path.” There is none. Some areas are harder than others, though, and better left for later. Changes include support for high FPS and a wiki. More on the forum for those interested.

item.title: Custom Unit Demo: Umbrella, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #232
item.description: Description of this map: A very simple level meant to focus on the strengths and weaknesses of the umbrella, a custom unit I made to dip my toes into 4RPL and CPACK units. The umbrella is a hybrid between a shield and a cannon that gets a hefty boost from height advantage. It’s easily overwhelmed by creeper waves though, and has a few other caveats. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

Here you’ll find islands, with gaps that’s too large for even ERNed pylons to reach. However, there is a blueprint on one of the islands close enough to the starting island, so maybe that could help you.

item.description: Description of this map: CW3 CSM inspired map. Created as a proof of concept for a #No4RPL version of CSM ideas. item.title: Football, by The_Mell | Creeper World 4 Colonies #601
item.description: Description of this map: An old field of sports becomes a battlefield. Where once fairness & victory have been, you find a vicious enemy & omens of early defeat. Can you win? And how long will this ‘game’ last..? This is somewhat a tribute to a map of Dark Reign back from the ’90s, but as there are already some “straight forward” maps in the exchange, i ended with a totally different approach and a siege setup.

item.title: Level 7, by Kaiden | Creeper World 4 Colonies #479
item.description: Description of this map: The first level in the series to have 4RPL units. Here you find a fort with damaged walls, several valleys with creeper breeder, crystal towers, and totems, and also there is three spore towers and a single emitter. One of the spore tower targets the greenar mother in particular. There are also a few AC temples and a bunch of bluite. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

This time, there’s a single crystal tower, as we;; as a few bluite crystals. There is a wall between the void spots, which gives you more time to prepare before the crimson creeper hits.. item.title: FPS: Upgraded, by qople | Creeper World 4 Colonies #467
item.description: Description of this map: Ask and ye shall receive! A much more substantial first-person level exploring and expanding what the gamemode has to offer. (There’s no significance to the empty right side of the map, there’s just no easy way to resize maps.) If it doesn’t look like you’re making progress in an area after a few minutes, there’s probably another area you can clear first to get upgrades. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.description: Description of this map: A transmission from a world mentions a world with a lot of crystals. You have arrived at the world, and the entrance of the caverns is in front of you. However, the creeper is already here. Can you enter the caverns before getting flooded? I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG

item.title: Deadly Florbs, by V | Creeper World 4 Colonies #559
item.description: Description of this map: Enemy spam mission, skip if that’s not your thing. Just wanted to play around with enemies in a way that makes them a constant, present danger instead of just a passive thing you build defenses for and forget about. The emitters aren’t the creeper threat here, the florbs are. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Containment Failure, by Bigbadblond | Creeper World 4 Colonies #492
item.description: Description of this map: This is a challenging map but fun! Containment wont last! Brace yourself for the wave! Try get as much ac produced as possible and keep things down! The map starts easy but once the stashes blow… good luck! May need to terrorform to get airstrip space depending what you do! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Orbital Insertion, by Fireswamp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #151
item.description: Description of this map: You are tasked with establishing a beachhead on a resource rich planet that recently fell to the creeper. In addition to the lack of enemy structures and the abundance of resources, you have a large quantity of orbital weapons at your disposal. With all of these advantages how hard could this be? I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Micro Map 3, by RBG | Creeper World 4 Colonies #411
item.description: Description of this map: Micro Map 3 is a very small map that focuses around anticreeper. There are anticreeper breeders around the bottom of the map and the entire map is suitable for mines, in addition to there being raw bluite near the spawn area. There are no eggs altlhough 4 minutes in and every 2 minutes past that a singular spore launches to somewhere in the map. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.description: Description of this map: Get your platforms, porters, and micro rifts ready, its time for Micro Map 2: Islands featuring islands, the void, spore launchers, and distances longer than a pylon can reach. item.title: War of Tides 1, by Theachevah | Creeper World 4 Colonies #512
item.description: Description of this map: Push forward to claim Totems against endless waves of Creeper. Claim the Anticreeper Resourse Packet and spend it wisely. Creeper and Anti Creeper will flow towards each other. Some 4RPL. A modified Anti Creeper Bertha can be built. A sweeper as seen in Span experiments can help you push the bonus reclaim objective. Enjoy. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: The Abyss, by Heisenberg | Creeper World 4 Colonies #453
item.description: Description of this map: Continents and Oceans stretch out around a giant void. The ocean current pushes creeper all over the map, until it disappears in a sink hole. Resources spread in all directions, and then there was the airsack. Have fun! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube?

item.title: Nexious, by Vertu | Creeper World 4 Colonies #419
item.description: Description of this map: Yes the typo is intentional This is meant to be a mixed difficulty that changes based on how you are playing. If you have a tough time you can camp and get your bearings, the real challenge is advancing once things heat up but overall is not meant to be super difficult. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: First Person Creeper World, by qople [FPS] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #341
item.description: Description of this map: We all knew it was only a matter of time. For some reason, you can’t place a command node on this planet, forcing you to descend from orbit yourself and fight the creeper on the ground. If people are interested in more first person maps, I will continue improving the cpack. (additional polish, maybe new weapons, etc.) Feedback is appreciated, positive or negative. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Prelude To Final Hour, by zaks | Creeper World 4 Colonies #263
item.description: Description of this map: Mission also know as Stash Rush. While the main operation takes preparation for final blow, your task is to anihilate Creeper stash and to nullify enemies. If you succed commander, next and final stage is going to bring us close to balance. Good luck! I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG

item.title: No Energy, by sam | Creeper World 4 Colonies #399
item.description: Had to replay this mission a few times because the audio wasn’t recorded correctly and thus tried a few different tactics. 00:00 Normal tactics 33:11 More efficient 38:54 Most efficient (the cannon is needed to defend against spores, though if you are lucky you don’t need the cannon and are a tad faster, though that relies on luck..) I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: The Price, by Sorrontis | Creeper World 4 Colonies #269
item.description: Description of this map: We’ve all heard of fools who sell their souls for fame and fortune. Have you heard of the ones who’d sell their snipers for a sector clear of creeper emitters. One’s here right now, reading, thinking. “Should I sell my soul to this friendly devil? He’s so trustworthy after all. What’s a flimsy little sniper compared to the creeper menace?” Do it. Sign. Sign the contract. Do it.

item.title: The Wave, by Sorrontis (REVISIT) | Creeper World 4 Colonies #21
item.description: As lots of you guys commented (See below!) on my first play of The Wave by Sorrontis, my strategy was clearly sub optimal. Therefore, I did revisit The Wave, to ride it better this time. Sometimes the optimal strategy may not be obvious from the start as the creeper behaves different than expected e.g. the speed, quantity, and strength of the creeper in this mission were slower, more and harder than I expected in the first run.
